title: Heavens on Earth with skeptical Dr. Michael Shermer
description:
Dr. Michael Shermer’s new book Heavens on Earth: 

Amazon US: http://amzn.to/2n2fu8p
Amazon Canada: http://amzn.to/2Bj9AVf

I recently sat down with Dr. Michael Shermer, editor of Skeptic Magazine, Scientific American columnist, and author of the new book Heavens on Earth. We talked about Deepak Chopra; the place of consciousness in the world; the neuroscience, evolutionary biology and metaphysics of Heaven and Hell; the pros and cons of ideas about the afterlife; the idea of “up” as the moral aim and the potential basis for that metaphor in the reality of the social hierarchy; the Kingdom of God as a psychological reality; the reality of transcendent experience; psychedelic experience; the definition of truth; Nietzsche’s critique of Christianity; transhumanism, the singularity, life extension and the prolongation of youth; the danger of losing our humanity in technological revolution; the malleability of identity; bodily and spiritual resurrection; the nature of the persistent and transforming self; Michael’s personal transformation from areligious to evangelical to skeptic; Sam Harris; the division of the damned from the saved (or the wheat from the chaff); Ayn Rand; Jocko Willink and the utility of striving; Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn; the truth of fiction; postmodernism and interpretation; dragons, archetypes and intrinsic brain structure; Martin Gardner; responsibility; social ethics; the nature of belief; the collapse of free will into determinism as the future shades into the present; moral accountability and the law; the aim of his new book (Heavens on Earth); a meaningful life and working to make the world a better place… and that’s about that. 

--- SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL ---

Direct Support: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/donate
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson

--- BOOKS ---

12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos: https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/
Maps of Meaning: The Architecture of Belief: https://jordanbpeterson.com/maps-of-meaning/

--- LINKS ---

Website: https://jordanbpeterson.com/
12 Rules for Life Tour: https://jordanbpeterson.com/events/
Blog: https://jordanbpeterson.com/blog/
Podcast: https://jordanbpeterson.com/podcast/
Reading List: https://jordanbpeterson.com/great-books/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jordanbpeterson
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jordan.b.peterson/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drjordanpeterson

--- PRODUCTS ---

Personality Course: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/personality
Self Authoring Suite: https://selfauthoring.com/
Understand Myself personality test: https://understandmyself.com/
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson
